name: Citrus Lime Fruit Dip
description: Thank you, Carrie Barfoot, for this recipe!
preparation: Using a hand mixer, beat mix with cream cheese and whipping cream on medium-high speed until smooth, about 2 min.
Serve dip in hollowed out pineapple, if desired.

products.name: Citrus Lime No Bake Cheesecake Mix (Pkg of 2)
summary: Velvety cheesecake with a balanced medley of tangy, tart, and sweet.
